desc.p: This field would contain the value of Net.Amt.Trade field in SECURITY.TRANS.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

t.desc:
This field will hold either one of the two values:
1) IN/OUT
- transaction has been considered as a flow.
2) NO.IN/OUT- transaction has not been considered as a flow.
Validation Rules:

desc.p: This field will contain the Account number read from STMT.ENTRY or SECURITY.TRANS.
This field would contain the value of the Amount.Lcy field in STMT.ENTRY.
This field will contain the Customer ID from STMT.ENTRY (Or) Security Account from SECURITY.TRANS.
This field would contain the Value Date from STMT.ENTRY (Or) Trade Date from SECURITY.TRANS.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
